verses.verse: הַמַּשָּׂא֙ <S%H4853><s%> The burden אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חָזָ֔ה <S%H2372><s%> did see חֲבַקּ֖וּק <S%H2265><s%> which Habakkuk הַנָּבִֽיא׃ <S%H5030><s%> the prophet

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> long אָ֧נָה <S%H575><s%> How יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD שִׁוַּ֖עְתִּי <S%H7768><s%> how long shall I cry וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִשְׁמָ֑ע <S%H8085><s%> and thou wilt not hear אֶזְעַ֥ק <S%H2199><s%> [even] cry out אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> to חָמָ֖ס <S%H2555><s%> unto thee [of] violence וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <S%H3467><s%> and thou wilt not save

לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תַרְאֵ֤נִי <S%H7200><s%> Why dost thou shew אָ֙וֶן֙ <S%H205><s%> me iniquity וְעָמָ֣ל <S%H5999><s%> grievance תַּבִּ֔יט <S%H5027><s%> and cause [me] to behold וְשֹׁ֥ד <S%H7701><s%> desolation וְחָמָ֖ס <S%H2555><s%> and violence לְנֶגְדִּ֑י <S%H5048><s%> are before וַיְהִ֧י <S%H1961><s%> exists רִ֦יב <S%H7379><s%> strife וּמָד֖וֹן <S%H4066><s%> and contention יִשָּֽׂא׃ <S%H5375><s%> [are] before me and there are [that] raise up

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that תָּפ֣וּג <S%H6313><s%> is slacked תּוֹרָ֔ה <S%H8451><s%> Therefore the law וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> go forth לָנֶ֖צַח <S%H5331><s%> doth never מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> and judgment כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For רָשָׁע֙ <S%H7563><s%> for the wicked מַכְתִּ֣יר <S%H3803><s%> doth compass אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצַּדִּ֔יק <S%H6662><s%> about the righteous עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> proceedeth מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment מְעֻקָּֽל׃ <S%H6127><s%> therefore wrong

רְא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> Behold בַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> ye among the heathen וְֽהַבִּ֔יטוּ <S%H5027><s%> and regard וְהִֽתַּמְּה֖וּ <S%H8539><s%> and wonder תְּמָ֑הוּ <S%H8539><s%> marvellously כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because פֹ֙עַל֙ <S%H6467><s%> a work פֹּעֵ֣ל <S%H6466><s%> for [I] will work בִּֽימֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H3117><s%> in your days לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ye will not תַאֲמִ֖ינוּ <S%H539><s%> [which] ye will not believe כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> if יְסֻפָּֽר׃ <S%H5608><s%> though it be told

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> behold מֵקִים֙ <S%H6965><s%> For lo I raise up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <S%H3778><s%> the Chaldeans הַגּ֖וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation הַמַּ֣ר <S%H4751><s%> [that] bitter וְהַנִּמְהָ֑ר <S%H4116><s%> and hasty הַֽהוֹלֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> which shall march לְמֶרְחֲבֵי־ <S%H4800><s%> through the breadth אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land לָרֶ֖שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> to possess מִשְׁכָּנ֥וֹת <S%H4908><s%> the dwellingplaces לֹּא־ <S%H3808><s%> not לֽוֹ׃

אָיֹ֥ם <S%H366><s%> They [are] terrible וְנוֹרָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> and dreadful ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מִמֶּ֕נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at מִשְׁפָּט֥וֹ <S%H4941><s%> their judgment וּשְׂאֵת֖וֹ <S%H7613><s%> and their dignity יֵצֵֽא׃ <S%H3318><s%> shall proceed

וְקַלּ֨וּ <S%H7043><s%> also are swifter מִנְּמֵרִ֜ים <S%H5246><s%> than the leopards סוּסָ֗יו <S%H5483><s%> Their horses וְחַדּוּ֙ <S%H2300><s%> and are more fierce מִזְּאֵ֣בֵי <S%H2061><s%> wolves עֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> than the evening וּפָ֖שׁוּ <S%H6335><s%> shall spread פָּֽרָשָׁ֑יו <S%H6571><s%> and their horsemen וּפָֽרָשָׁיו֙ <S%H6571><s%> themselves and their horsemen מֵרָח֣וֹק <S%H7350><s%> from far יָבֹ֔אוּ <S%H935><s%> shall come יָעֻ֕פוּ <S%H5774><s%> they shall fly כְּנֶ֖שֶׁר <S%H5404><s%> as the eagle חָ֥שׁ <S%H2363><s%> [that] hasteth לֶאֱכֽוֹל׃ <S%H398><s%> to eat

כֻּלֹּה֙ <S%H3605><s%> All לְחָמָ֣ס <S%H2555><s%> all for violence יָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> They shall come מְגַמַּ֥ת <S%H4041><s%> shall sup up פְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> their faces קָדִ֑ימָה <S%H6921><s%> [as] the east wind וַיֶּאֱסֹ֥ף <S%H622><s%> and they shall gather כַּח֖וֹל <S%H2344><s%> as the sand שֶֽׁבִי׃ <S%H7628><s%> the captivity

וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he בַּמְּלָכִ֣ים <S%H4428><s%> at the kings יִתְקַלָּ֔ס <S%H7046><s%> And they shall scoff וְרֹזְנִ֖ים <S%H7336><s%> and the princes מִשְׂחָ֣ק <S%H4890><s%> shall be a scorn ל֑וֹ ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every מִבְצָ֣ר <S%H4013><s%> every strong hold יִשְׂחָ֔ק <S%H7832><s%> unto them they shall deride וַיִּצְבֹּ֥ר <S%H6651><s%> for they shall heap עָפָ֖ר <S%H6083><s%> dust וַֽיִּלְכְּדָֽהּ׃ <S%H3920><s%> and take

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then חָלַ֥ף <S%H2498><s%> change ר֛וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Then shall [his] mind וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> and he shall pass over וְאָשֵׁ֑ם <S%H816><s%> and offend ז֥וּ <S%H2098><s%> [imputing] this כֹח֖וֹ <S%H3581><s%> his power לֵאלֹהֽוֹ׃ <S%H430><s%> angels

הֲל֧וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you מִקֶּ֗דֶם <S%H6924><s%> [Art] thou not from everlasting יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהַ֛י <S%H430><s%> my God קְדֹשִׁ֖י <S%H6918><s%> my Holy לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not נָמ֑וּת <S%H4191><s%> crying יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God לְמִשְׁפָּ֣ט <S%H4941><s%> them for judgment שַׂמְתּ֔וֹ <S%H7760><s%> thou hast ordained וְצ֖וּר <S%H6697><s%> and O mighty God לְהוֹכִ֥יחַ <S%H3198><s%> them for correction יְסַדְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3245><s%> thou hast established

טְה֤וֹר <S%H2890><s%> pureness עֵינַ֙יִם֙ <S%H5869><s%> eyes מֵרְא֣וֹת <S%H7200><s%> than to behold רָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> evil וְהַבִּ֥יט <S%H5027><s%> not look אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on עָמָ֖ל <S%H5999><s%> on iniquity לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and You תוּכָ֑ל <S%H3201><s%> and canst לָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תַבִּיט֙ <S%H5027><s%> wherefore lookest בּֽוֹגְדִ֔ים <S%H898><s%> thou upon them that deal treacherously תַּחֲרִ֕ישׁ <S%H2790><s%> [and] holdest thy tongue בְּבַלַּ֥ע <S%H1104><s%> devoureth רָשָׁ֖ע <S%H7563><s%> when the wicked צַדִּ֥יק <S%H6662><s%> [the man that is] more righteous מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> are too

וַתַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> And makest אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> men כִּדְגֵ֣י <S%H1709><s%> as the fishes הַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea כְּרֶ֖מֶשׂ <S%H7431><s%> as the creeping things לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> without מֹשֵׁ֥ל <S%H4910><s%> [that have] no ruler בּֽוֹ׃

כֻּלֹּה֙ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּחַכָּ֣ה <S%H2443><s%> all of them with the angle הֵֽעֲלָ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> They take up יְגֹרֵ֣הוּ <S%H1641><s%> they catch בְחֶרְמ֔וֹ <S%H2764><s%> them in their net וְיַאַסְפֵ֖הוּ <S%H622><s%> and gather בְּמִכְמַרְתּ֑וֹ <S%H4365><s%> them in their drag עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יִשְׂמַ֥ח <S%H8055><s%> therefore they rejoice וְיָגִֽיל׃ <S%H1523><s%> and are glad

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that יְזַבֵּ֣חַ <S%H2076><s%> Therefore they sacrifice לְחֶרְמ֔וֹ <S%H2764><s%> unto their net וִֽיקַטֵּ֖ר <S%H6999><s%> and burn incense לְמִכְמַרְתּ֑וֹ <S%H4365><s%> unto their drag כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because בָהֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> because by them שָׁמֵ֣ן <S%H8082><s%> [is] fat חֶלְק֔וֹ <S%H2506><s%> their portion וּמַאֲכָל֖וֹ <S%H3978><s%> and their meat בְּרִאָֽה׃ <S%H1277><s%> plenteous

הַ֥עַל <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יָרִ֣יק <S%H7324><s%> Shall they therefore empty חֶרְמ֑וֹ <S%H2764><s%> their net וְתָמִ֛יד <S%H8548><s%> continually לַהֲרֹ֥ג <S%H2026><s%> to slay גּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> nations לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without יַחְמֽוֹל׃ <S%H2550><s%> and not spare ס
